nl.vu.cs.cn
Class TCP

java.lang.Object
  nl.vu.cs.cn.TCP

public class TCP
extends Object

This class represents a TCP stack. It should be built on top of the IP stack which is bound to a given IP address.

Nested Class Summary
 class TCP.Socket
          This class represents a TCP socket.

          The underlying IP stack for this TCP stack.

Field Detail

ip

private IP ip
The underlying IP stack for this TCP stack.

Constructor Detail

TCP

public TCP(int address)
    throws IOException
Constructs a TCP stack for the given virtual address. The virtual address for this TCP stack is then 192.168.1.address.

Parameters:
address - The last octet of the virtual IP address 1-254.
Throws:
IOException - if the IP stack fails to initialize.
Method Detail

socket

public TCP.Socket socket()
Returns:
a new socket for this stack

socket

public TCP.Socket socket(int port)
Parameters:
port - the port to bind the socket to.
Returns:
a new server socket for this stack bound to the given port
